info.title: Geocode
info.description:
Metropolis Geocode finds the associated geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude) from a given worldwide address provided.

Metropolis can turn any address data of yours into latitude longitude values.  Plain and Simple.

get.description: The API takes the provided address and returns the latitude and longitude for the desired location.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address to be Geocoded (Format expected: Street, City, State, ZipCode and Country)
